item.title: AquaMarine in Singapore offers a selection of nutritious buffet options
item.description: Source: Marina Mandarin by Meritus. This April, AquaMarine, the restaurant located in Singapore’s luxurious 5-star Marina Mandarin hotel, is putting a spotlight on healthy dining. Their halal-certified buffet features a variety of fresh, organic ingredients. Through the end of April, AquaMarine diners can enjoy live cooking stations, fresh seafood, Singaporean favorites, and international dishes, all prepared with a healthy approach. For instance, the popular chicken rice at the Chinese live station is served with brown rice, and wholewheat flour is used for pasta and tortillas.
